statements: SELECT * FROM coastal_erosion_data
SELECT area_name, erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_data
SELECT area_name, protection_measures FROM coastal_erosion_data
SELECT area_id, area_name, erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE erosion_rate > 5
SELECT * FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE area_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE erosion_rate > 5.00 ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE erosion_rate BETWEEN 3.50 AND 7.00;
SELECT area_name, protection_measures FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE protection_measures IS NOT NULL AND area_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT area_name, erosion_rate, protection_measures FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE erosion_rate < 2.00 OR (area_name = 'Beachfront' AND protection_measures != '');
SELECT AVG(erosion_rate) AS average_erosion_rate, MIN(erosion_rate) AS min_erosion_rate, MAX(erosion_rate) AS max_erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_data;
SELECT * FROM coastal_erosion_rates;
SELECT location, erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_rates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT measure_name, implementation_date FROM coastal_protection_measures;
SELECT * FROM coastal_protection_measures WHERE measure_type = 'seawall';
SELECT id, measure_type, implementation_date FROM coastal_protection_measures ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM coastal_erosion_rates WHERE erosion_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(erosion_rate) AS average_erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_rates GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT measure_name, measure_type, implementation_date FROM coastal_protection_measures WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, SUM(erosion_rate) AS total_erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_rates GROUP BY location HAVING total_erosion_rate > 50;
SELECT * FROM coastal_protection_measures WHERE measure_type = 'Hard Structure' ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT location_name, erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion;
SELECT measure_name, cost FROM protective_measures ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT location_id, erosion_rate, measurement_date FROM coastal_erosion WHERE erosion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM erosion_predictions WHERE prediction_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT location_name, erosion_rate, measurement_date FROM coastal_erosion ORDER BY erosion_rate DESC, measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM coastal_erosion;
SELECT location_name, erosion_rate, measurement_date FROM coastal_erosion ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion WHERE erosion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT MAX(cost) AS highest_cost FROM protective_measures;
SELECT p.prediction_id, p.prediction_date, c.location_name, p.predicted_erosion_rate FROM erosion_predictions p JOIN coastal_erosion c ON p.location_id = c.location_id ORDER BY p.prediction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM erosion_rates;
SELECT location, erosion_rate, measurement_date FROM erosion_rates ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, coastline_length FROM coastal_areas WHERE exposure_rating > 3;
SELECT measure_name, implementation_date FROM protection_measures WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4 ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT erosion_measurement FROM erosion_logs WHERE location_id = 2 AND measurement_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM erosion_rates WHERE erosion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT area_name, coastline_length FROM coastal_areas WHERE exposure_rating > 2
SELECT measure_name, implementation_date FROM protection_measures WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4 ORDER BY implementation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM erosion_logs WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT location, erosion_rate FROM erosion_rates WHERE location = 'Pacific Coast'
SELECT * FROM CoastalErosionRates;
SELECT location_name, erosion_rate FROM CoastalErosionRates ORDER BY erosion_rate DESC;
SELECT area_name, threat_level FROM VulnerableCoastalAreas WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT measure_name, effectiveness, cost FROM CoastalProtectionMeasures WHERE cost > 5000;
SELECT log_id, log_date, success_rate FROM ProtectionMeasureLogs ORDER BY success_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM CoastalErosionRates WHERE erosion_rate > 5.0;
SELECT location_name, date_recorded FROM CoastalErosionRates ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT area_name, threat_level FROM VulnerableCoastalAreas WHERE threat_level = 'High' ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT measure_name, cost, effectiveness FROM CoastalProtectionMeasures WHERE cost < 1000 AND effectiveness > 0.8;
SELECT measure_name, success_rate FROM ProtectionMeasureLogs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND log_date <= '2022-12-31';
